_header: Saint Martin was a noble man
_description: Life of St. Martin in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: SAint Martin was a nobill manfor in his barnhede he began…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …He wis vs wisch for to winVnto þat welth þat he wons in
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: In festo sancti Martini episcopi historia (rubric, f. 188ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 152-5.
